title: It's Summer Baby!!!  Move in Your New Home Now!!!
posting_body: My name is Arthur and I am a REALTOR with Keller Williams Realty in Norcross.
My company is working with an amazing Lease with a Right to Purchase program.

If you qualify for the program, you get to pick a house that is FOR SALE based on your approved rent, in a community where our Investor purchases the home on your behalf and you would get to rent that house with the option to purchase for up to 5 years.
You are only obligated to a 1 YEAR LEASE term at a time, with a right to renew your lease for up to 5 years*.
You can purchase the home at any time for a pre-agreed upon price.
And Best of ALL, there's NO Down Payment required!!!
I would love to tell you more.
If you have a few minutes to reach out today, I can give you more
I hope we can connect and your housing search goes smoothly.
I look forward to hearing from you soon!
*The photo in the ad is for illustration purposes only
